程序包 com.google.typography.font.tools.fontinfo

类 FontInfo

java.lang.Object
com.google.typography.font.tools.fontinfo.FontInfo
public class FontInfo extends Object
Class of static functions that return information about a given font
作者:
Brian Stell, Han-Wen Yeh

  • 构造器详细资料

    • FontInfo

      public FontInfo()

  • 方法详细资料

    • sfntVersion

      public static String sfntVersion(Font font)
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      the sfnt version of the font

    • listFontMetrics

      public static DataDisplayTable listFontMetrics(Font font)
      Gets a list of information regarding various dimensions about the given font from the head, hhea, and OS/2 font tables
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of dimensional information about the font

    • listTables

      public static DataDisplayTable listTables(Font font)
      Gets a list of tables in the font as well as their sizes. This function returns a list of tables in the given font as well as their sizes, both in bytes and as fractions of the overall font size. The information for each font is contained in a TableInfo object.
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of information about tables in the font provided

    • listNameEntries

      public static DataDisplayTable listNameEntries(Font font)
      Gets a list of entries in the name table of a font. These entries contain information related to the font, such as the font name, style name, and copyright notices.
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of entries in the name table of the font

    • listCmaps

      public static DataDisplayTable listCmaps(Font font)
      Gets a list containing the platform ID, encoding ID, and format of all the cmaps in a font
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of information about the cmaps in the font

    • numChars

      public static int numChars(Font font)
      Gets the number of valid characters in the given font
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      the number of valid characters in the given font
      抛出:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if font does not contain a UCS-4 or UCS-2 cmap

    • listChars

      public static DataDisplayTable listChars(Font font)
      Gets a list of code points of valid characters and their names in the given font.
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of code points of valid characters and their names in the given font.
      抛出:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if font does not contain a UCS-4 or UCS-2 cmap

    • listCharBlockCoverage

      public static DataDisplayTable listCharBlockCoverage(Font font)
      Gets a list of Unicode blocks covered by the font and the amount each block is covered.
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of Unicode blocks covered by the font

    • listScriptCoverage

      public static DataDisplayTable listScriptCoverage(Font font)
      Gets a list of scripts covered by the font and the amount each block is covered.
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of scripts covered by the font

    • listCharsNeededToCoverScript

      public static DataDisplayTable listCharsNeededToCoverScript(Font font)
      Gets a list of characters needed to fully cover scripts partially covered by the font
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of characters needed to fully cover partially-covered scripts

    • numGlyphs

      public static int numGlyphs(Font font)
      Gets the number of glyphs in the given font
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      the number of glyphs in the font
      抛出:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if font does not contain a valid glyf table

    • listGlyphDimensionBounds

      public static DataDisplayTable listGlyphDimensionBounds(Font font)
      Gets a list of minimum and maximum x and y dimensions for the glyphs in the font. This is based on the reported min and max values for each glyph and not on the actual outline sizes.
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of glyph dimensions for the font

    • hintingSize

      public static String hintingSize(Font font)
      Gets the size of hinting instructions in the glyph table, both in bytes and as a fraction of the glyph table size.
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      the amount of hinting that is contained in the font

    • listSubglyphFrequency

      public static DataDisplayTable listSubglyphFrequency(Font font)
      Gets a list of glyphs in the font that are used as subglyphs and the number of times each subglyph is used as a subglyph
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      the number of glyphs in the font that are used as subglyphs of other glyphs more than once

    • listUnmappedGlyphs

      public static DataDisplayTable listUnmappedGlyphs(Font font)
      Gets a list of IDs for glyphs that are not mapped by any cmap in the font
      参数:
      font - the source font
      返回:
      a list of unmapped glyphs
